name: Geno 2 the Generals' Orders
summary:
In this game, you play as Geno and team up with your bro Khad to fight the new generals on the block. Geno is amped up with some new moves this time around like a power slide, a shoulder bash, a spinning somersault, and an areal bounce shot!

Collect many cherries gems and other secrets as you make your way to collecting all of the power orbs. Complete as you please with an open-ended level design and a very open and unseparated map.

if you want bosses, then you'll get bosses! fight a giant weatherman, an alien, and a pair of lips?
